programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP72 You're Sapphired! [English Dub]
programme.desc: Ellery Queen, the owner of the legendary sapphire called "The Eye of Solomon," is also the owner of a football team. Lupin, coming for the sapphire as announced, discovers Queen on the brink of death.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP73 It's a Purloin-a-Palooza! [English Dub]
programme.desc: The 3rd Thieves Olympic is about to be held in Japan, and Lupin and Jigen are in it to win it! After winning the first and second Thieves Olympic, if they also win this year's getaway race, they'll become the first-ever Triple-Crown winners!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP74 For Larva or Money [English Dub]
programme.desc: The world's largest diamond has been discovered in South Africa and Lupin has his eyes on the prize. But as it turns out, stealing it is the easy part!

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP71 Hedgehog Hunt
programme.desc: Chaotix still aren't able to find their home. Upon taking a wrong turn in space, they've landed on a planet where they are now running a caf√© in order to raise money for the ship's repair. All seems to be going (relatively) well when Dr. Eggman shows up with an offer of reward for Sonic and his crew's capture.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP72 Zelkova Strikes Back
programme.desc: Blue Typhoon is under attack by Yellow Zelkova who is equipped with a special energy shield built by Dr. Eggman. Sonic and his crew are sent crashing down to a nearby planet where Knuckles and Sonic attempt to destroy the powerful weapon.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP73 The Cosmo Conspiracy
programme.desc: Shadow breaches Blue Typhoon, appearing in Cosmo's room. As he knocks Sonic and Chris unconscious, Shadow goes after Cosmo whom Tails has taken away to safety.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP74 Eye Spy
programme.desc: Blue Typhoon is mysteriously transported to an abandoned planet as Cosmo discovers that Metarex are monitoring what she sees and hears through a chip that is implanted in her. As Tails and Chris try to find a way to remove Cosmo's chip, Amy and Rouge discover that the planet is Cosmo and Metarex's home planet.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP75 The Bride Came D.O.A. [English Dub]
programme.desc: Fujiko decides to marry Huffner for his Jewely collection, disregarding the rumour that Huffner's brides always die a mysterious death within a few weeks of their wedding. Turns out, he's also a collector of brides and likes them permanently preserved!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP76 Dark Charade [English Dub]
programme.desc: Jigen receives a letter from Sister Angelica and heads to the African country of Borodias. Sister Angelica wants Jigen's help to rescue Dr. Othello, the leader of the country's independence movement.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP77 Lupin's Psychic Fiend [English Dub]
programme.desc: The ICPO tries a different approach to capturing Lupin: Astrology. It enlists the help of Marianne, a clairvoyant who can read Lupin's actions using astrological predictions and her crystal ball.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP77 Lupin's Psychic Fiend [English Dub]
programme.desc: The ICPO tries a different approach to capturing Lupin: Astrology. It enlists the help of Marianne, a clairvoyant who can read Lupin's actions using astrological predictions and her crystal ball.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP78 Ice, Robot [English Dub]
programme.desc: Fujiko calls Lupin from Professor Pot's lab, but since Lupin is half-asleep, Jigen takes the call instead. Fujiko claims Professor Pot has accidentally invented a robot that manufactures diamonds, but Jigen doesn't believe a word she says and hangs up.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [Japanese Audio]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd -PART 2 EP79 The Lupin Funeral March [Japanese Audio]
programme.desc: Fujiko has invited Lupin and company to a classical concert conducted by Kyoransky from the International Philharmonic. After they get a good look at Kyoransky's baton, studded with a a diamond worth at least 200 million yen.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP75 Agent of Mischief
programme.desc: When everyone is informed by Dr. Eggman of Metarex' gathering in accordance to a thousand-year prophecy Sonic and his crew head off for their final battle, leaving Shadow behind. However Shadow soon follows suit as Chaotix drop by to offer him a ride.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP76 The Light in The Darkness
programme.desc: With Sonic being knocked down to Planet Aqurius and Dark Oak still continuing the evolution to its final form, Knuckles and team come up with a plan to cut off Dark Oak's energy by firing the Master Emerald at Metarex.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP77 A Fearless Friend
programme.desc: Metarex seed continues to grow into its final form and Sonic and his team are unable to stop it. As Chaotix collect Chaos Emerald now drained of its power, Dr. Eggman reveals a plan to restore their power.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP78 So Long Sonic
programme.desc: With the sacrifice of Cosmo, Dark Oak has finally been destroyed. The crew mourns the loss of Cosmo though they are quickly faced with another trouble as the Planet Egg begins to release its explosive energy.

programme.title: Naruto the Movie: Guardians of the Crescent Moon Kingdom [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Naruto, Sakura, and Kakashi team up with Rock Lee to escort Prince Michiru and his son Hikaru, but a villainous uprising awaits their homecoming.

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 3: Fade to Black [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must fight a lonely battle to save Rukia before the two are forced to part ways forever!

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E07 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves ‚ÄúSphinx‚Äù start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E08 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves ‚ÄúSphinx‚Äù start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E09 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves ‚ÄúSphinx‚Äù start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress [English Subtitle]
programme.sub-title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress E07 [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: At a time when the industrial revolution was carrying the world into the modern age, a horde of undead monsters suddenly appeared. They could not be killed unless their hearts, which were protected by a layer of iron, were pierced. Humans bitten by them would come back as undead monsters themselves. These undead, which would later be known as "Kabane," exploded in population until they finally overran the world. - - The people of Hinomoto, a nation in the far east, built fortresses known as "stations" throughout the land that have allowed them to survive the threat of the Kabane. People can only travel between these stations using fortified steam locomotives known as "Hayajiro," and they have managed to stay alive by sharing resources in this way. - - Ikoma is a young steamsmith living at Aragane Station, a city that specializes in the manufacture of iron and steam engines. He is working on developing a unique anti-Kabane weapon called a "piercing gun" as he waits for his chance to prove his strength. - - Then, one day, a Hayajiro called the "Iron Fortress" makes its way through the front lines to arrive at Aragane Station. When Ikoma begins his usual maintenance routine, he sees a mysterious girl who is exempt from her Kabane inspection. That night, Ikoma sees the girl again and learns that her name is Mumei, but then an out-of-control Hayajiro overrun by Kabane charges into Aragane Station. - - The Kabane pour out of the train into Aragane Station. Ikoma races against the flow of the panicked residents, this time determined not to run away, but to defeat the Kabane with his piercing gun!

programme.sub-title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress E08 [English Subtitle]

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 4: Hell Verse [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must travel into the depths of Hell to stop a group of vicious Sinners and save his younger sister Yuzu, unaware that his actions could bring Hell to the World of the Living.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter: The Last Mission [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: The Battle Olympia begins! Gon and team attend, but The Shadow puts a deadly end to the festivities!

programme.title: Naruto the Movie: Guardians of the Crescent Moon Kingdom [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Naruto, Sakura, and Kakashi team up with Rock Lee to escort Prince Michiru and his son Hikaru, but a villainous uprising awaits their homecoming.

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 3: Fade to Black [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must fight a lonely battle to save Rukia before the two are forced to part ways forever!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP59 Madame Prefers Them Hand-Dipped [English Dub]
programme.desc: After shaking off Inspector Zenigata's pursuit, Lupin is stopped by a monstrously huge Fujiko on his way home! The giant Fujiko turns out to be an illusion created by Madame X. Lupin learns Madame X's hobby is collecting famous people.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP60 Holy Cow [English Dub]
programme.desc: Bandit leader Basara is determined to sniff out the location of the diamonds Lupin has hidden somewhere in India. Armed with his sinister invention, the Suicide Ray Gun, he tries to make Lupin talk, even trying his luck with a fake Fujiko.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP61 The Yam Is Mightier Than The Sword [English Dub]
programme.desc: Trouble is all but guaranteed when a crime boss and an arms merchant join hands. The two set their eyes on Goemen's sword, which can split a tank in half! After hiring Fujiko to steal it, they transform the sword into an invincible flying weapon of war.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP62 Church of the Poison Mind [English Dub]
programme.desc: Jigen and Goemon have sent a letter saying they are being held captive in a small but terrifying village. Lupin arrives in the village to rescue them, but Jigen and Goemon are acting oddly.
